name: Fight, Don't Fly
description:
In the world of heroes and villains, one's place seems obvious. But, our protagonist, Lleya, thinks otherwise. Given the chance to fight for what he believes in, he may choose to do so. But, some may be so entrenched in their own worldviews that they can't see his new ideas. 

Left click to walk, right click to talk

All Assets made by me!!

I literally can't weight paint or animate (yet) so please enjoy a slidey boi
